# allowedScrollTypesMask

**Instance Property**

A scroll type mask that enables recognition of scroll events.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var allowedScrollTypesMask: UIScrollTypeMask { get set }
```

## Discussion

Setting this mask enables the pan gesture to recognize scroll events, like a mouse scroll movement or a two-finger scroll on a track pad. See [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIScrollType].



## Tracking scroll events

- **UIScrollTypeMask**: A bit mask identifying the scroll type of a pan gesture.
- **UIScrollType**: Constants that define the type of the scroll.
